creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: very long fabric strip; red, black, yellow, white, green and blue stripes; grey metal beads and white flass beads at ends; short red fringe; red embroidered strips at ends
dimension: 153 x 10 15/16 in. (388.62 x 27.78 cm) (without fringe or glass beads)
medium: Cotton, lead and glass beads; needlework
title: Man's Loincloth
